games.Title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.Description: An open-world adventure game where players explore the vast kingdom of Hyrule to defeat Calamity Ganon.

games.Title: Elden Ring
games.Description: An action RPG set in a vast fantasy world created by George R.R. Martin and Hidetaka Miyazaki.

games.Title: Cyberpunk 2077
games.Description: An open-world RPG set in the dystopian Night City, where players assume the role of V, a mercenary.

games.Title: God of War Ragnar√∂k
games.Description: A continuation of Kratos' and Atreus' journey through the Norse realms, facing the end of the world.

games.Title: God of War
games.Description: An God of War 2D metroidvania where players explore the ancient and mysterious kingdom of Hallownest.

games.Title: Hollow Knight
games.Description: An action-adventure game where players explore the ancient and mysterious kingdom of Hallownest.

games.Title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
games.Description: An open-world RPG where players control Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter searching for his adopted daughter.

games.Title: Dark Souls III
games.Description: An action RPG known for its challenging gameplay and intricate world design.

games.Title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
games.Description: An action-adventure game set in Sengoku-era Japan, where players control a shinobi named Wolf.

games.Title: Hades
games.Description: A roguelike dungeon crawler where players control Zagreus, the son of Hades, as he attempts to escape the Underworld.

games.Title: DOOM Eternal
games.Description: A fast-paced first-person shooter where players control the Doom Slayer to battle demons.

games.Title: Resident Evil Village
games.Description: A survival horror game where players control Ethan Winters as he searches for his kidnapped daughter.

games.Title: Final Fantasy VII Remake
games.Description: A reimagining of the classic RPG, focusing on the first part of the original game's story.

games.Title: Persona 5 Royal
games.Description: An enhanced version of the original Persona 5, featuring new characters and story elements.

games.Title: Monster Hunter: World
games.Description: An action RPG where players hunt down massive monsters in a living ecosystem.

games.Title: Overwatch
games.Description: A team-based multiplayer first-person shooter featuring a diverse cast of characters.

games.Title: Apex Legends
games.Description: A free-to-play battle royale game set in the Titanfall universe.

games.Title: Fortnite
games.Description: A free-to-play battle royale game where players build structures and fight to be the last one standing.

games.Title: Genshin Impact
games.Description: An open-world action RPG set in the fantasy world of Teyvat, featuring gacha mechanics.

games.Title: Stardew Valley
games.Description: A farming simulation game where players manage a farm and build relationships with villagers.
